   10 BLACK=0:RED=1:GREEN=2:YELLOW=3:BLUE=4:MAGENTA=5:CYAN=6:WHITE=7
   20 MODE2
   30 GCOL0,128+GREEN
   40 CLG
   50 GCOL0,WHITE
   60 FOR X=-1200 TO 1280+1200 STEP 100
   70 MOVE640,600
   80 DRAWX,0
   90 NEXT
  100 GCOL0,BLACK
  110 MOVE0,1024:MOVE0,400:PLOT 85,1280,1280:PLOT85,1280,400
  120 LET Y=400
  130 GCOL0,WHITE
  140 FORA=1 TO 10
  150 MOVE0,Y
  160 DRAW1280,Y
  170 Y=Y-(10000/Y)
  180 NEXT A
  190 FOR S=1 TO 150
  200 GCOL0,RND(7)
  210 PLOT69,RND(1280),RND(623)+401
  220  NEXT
  230 GCOL1,WHITE 
  240 PROCcircle(1000,700,60)
  250 GCOL0,BLACK
  260 PROCcircle(975,680,10)
  261 READX,Y:IFX=0 THEN END
  262 PLOT69,X,Y
  263 GOTO 261
  280 DEFPROCcircle(X,Y,R)
  290 MOVEX,Y
  300 FORI=0TO 360 STEP 15 
  310 MOVEX,Y
  320 PLOT85,SINRAD(I)*R+X,COSRAD(I)*R+Y
  330 NEXT
  340 ENDPROC
  350 DATA 1002,755,956,735,1055,700,990,715,1020,670,950,699
  360 DATA0,0
